We’re excited to share that Krysia from our BioGenies team has traveled to Osaka, Japan to participate in the Metabolomics 2024 conference! 🧪✨ 
This event is a gathering of leading minds in the field of metabolomics, offering a platform to explore the latest research, tools, and technologies that are shaping the future of metabolic studies.

Krysia will be engaging with global experts, presenting our team's work (imputomics), and bringing back invaluable insights to push our research forward.
